channel.title: 718 WebClient help **Paying**
channel.description:
Hello, I need help making a 718 WebClient for my server. If you can help please add me on Skype "TheCharlieHD"
Thanks in advance

item.title: 718 WebClient help **Paying**
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Arcik:

Hes not even paying lol

Look at the end of the thread topic

[quote=“Fails, post:9, topic:491164”]Number 1 was more or less directed toward the OP.

Anyway, I can see members buying work off of other trustworthy, knowledgeable members. What I can’t see is someone paying for help, not knowing if the volunteer knows what he or she is doing. They could be completely clueless.[/quote]
Ah I see, it was just that you quoted my post I thought it was directed towards me, my bad :o. Towards the end of your post, that’s one of the main reasons that payments have never been allowed on these sites, you have no guarantee of what you’re getting :P. It’s a huge problem at almost every other community that allows it, only a fool would allow them to organise payments through their website with the problems it causes on a daily basis

Read full topic

item.title: 718 WebClient help **Paying**
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

Number 1 was more or less directed toward the OP.

Anyway, I can see members buying work off of other trustworthy, knowledgeable members. What I can’t see is someone paying for help, not knowing if the volunteer knows what he or she is doing. They could be completely clueless.

*Edit: If one member is going to direct another to google there’s no point in even commenting. In my eyes, that isn’t considered helping.

Read full topic

item.title: 718 WebClient help **Paying**
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Hes not even paying lol

Read full topic

item.title: 718 WebClient help **Paying**
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:6, topic:491164”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=609397.msg4232745#msg4232745 date=1361386564]
You could try by posting in the correct section. You could then follow up by reading the rules and then the realisation will come that you can’t pay for any form of help on this site. Help on MoparScape will always be free.
[/quote]

  1. Who in their right mind would pay for anything on this site?
  2. You will rarely come across a member that doesn’t direct you to google.[/quote]
  3. I have people PM me daily and ask to buy stuff from me lol
  4. You will rarely come across a member who has consulted google before posting there

:P.

Read full topic

item.title: 718 WebClient help **Paying**
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Daniels1771:

Everytime I do make a topic no one helps me anyway.

So you thought you’d change to the wrong board? Doesn’t seem very logical to me :P. Wait your turn, people who answer those questions do it out of their own time and the goodness of their heart, at least have a little patience :).

Read full topic
